summary: This document is a chain of emails from June 2019 arranging a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case. It involves FBI personnel from the Violent Crimes Task Force and Victim Services Division coordinating scheduling for the call.

events.title: Conference call on Epstein victim interviews
events.description: An unclassified conference call was scheduled for 2 pm Eastern Time to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force and Victim Services Division were coordinating a conference call in June 2019 to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case.
The call was scheduled for June 28, 2019, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity and inter-divisional coordination within the FBI regarding victim interviews.
Multiple email addresses are redacted, indicating the involvement of several law enforcement officials whose identities are protected.
